name: We Should Totally Stab Caesar!
description:
It is a beautiful day in Rome, and you are a terrible Senator. 

Play through two days and make dubious decisions so you can Totally Stab Caesar! 

Immerse yourself in a historical-ahistorical comedy game, featuring everyone's fave Hench Man Mark Antony, Asterix-inspired gladiators, and of course, a lot of honeyed dormice.

made by Hannah Raymond-Cox on Twine
